瑿瑿瑿

瑿字的基本解释

瑿
yī
黑色的美石。
黑玉：“玉有九色，元（玄）如澄水曰瑿。”
黑色的琥珀：“琥珀最贵者名曰瑿，红而微带黑，然昼见则黑，灯光下则红甚也。”

瑿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yī］
［《集韻》煙奚切，平齊，影。］
黑色的琥珀。

瑿字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑿； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页740第19
【集韵】煙奚切，音鷖。美石，黑色。【正韵】黑玉。舊註美石黑色，誤。【本草】琥珀千年者爲瑿，状似?玉，黑如純漆，大如車輪。永昌有黑玉鏡，卽瑿也。

考證：〔【集韻】煙奚切，音兮。〕　謹按兮字屬匣母，煙字屬影母，煙奚切不得音兮，今據集韻兮改鷖。
瑿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瑿字的起名意思

指黑色的美石，黑玉或黑色的琥珀。

瑿
Basic explanation of words
瑿
yī
Black beautiful stone.
Black jade: "Jade has nine colors, and the yuan (xuan) is like Chengshui and said 瑿."
Black amber: "The most expensive amber is named 瑿. It is red and slightly black, but it is black when seen during the day, and it is even red under the light."
瑿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yī］
["Ji Yun" smoke is cut, level, and shadow. ]
Black amber.
瑿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑿; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 740 Page 19
【Jiyun】Smoke Xi cut, sound 鹥. Beautiful stone, black. 【Positive rhyme】Black jade. The old note is black, wrong. 【Materia Medica】Amber for millennia is 瑿, which looks like jade, black as pure lacquer, and as big as a wheel. There are black jade mirrors in Yongchang. Textual research: [[Jiyun] Yan Xiqie, sound Xi. 〕　 I would like to press the character Xi to belong to the mother of box, and the character to smoke to belong to the mother of shadow.
瑿

Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
瑿
Name meaning
Refers to black beautiful stone, black jade or black amber.
yī
1. черный нефрит, черная яшма 2. черный янтарь
